description: This file defines application routing using react-router-dom for a React frontend. It includes a component `AppRoutes` that sets up route mapping to main app and recipe modal views, and a `RecipeRouteBinder` component that synchronizes route parameters with application state for recipe detail modal handling.

methods.name: RecipeRouteBinder()
methods.description: Component that synchronizes URL route parameters to application state for displaying recipe details in a modal.

methods.name: AppRoutes()
methods.description: Main routing component that sets up route paths for the application.
